title: Genussmanufaktur
description: React web app to filter, search and display products dynamically. View all products in a responsive grid, or cycle through them individually with additional information.

title: Music player
description: Vanilla JavaScript rebuilt music player app. Shuffle or repeat songs and select song from a playlist.

title: less & more
description: UI and branding for a social good website capstone project. Prototypes for desktop and mobile created with Figma.

title: Art Gallery Map
description: Map of London East and West End Galleries, 148 x 210 mm, map/leaflet, 4 pages

title: Monumentality
description: Exhibition catalogue accompanying a group show at the Henry Moore Foundation, softcover, 185 x 245 mm, 52 pages

title: Motherwell
description: Robert Motherwell's Open series catalogue, hardcover, 245 x 310 mm, 184 pages

title: Unit2
description: various Unit2 exhibition leaflets that unfold into a poster, 148 x 210 mm

title: Mépris
description: Screenprinted movie poster for Jean-Luc Godard's Le Mépris, 841 x 1188 mm

title: Smirnoff Sound Collective
description: Video title cards and closing credits for a series of documentaries on german electronic music labels
